titleStmt.title: A letter sent from His Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax, and the chief commanders in the army, to the right honourable the lord major, aldermen, and common-councell of the city of London
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Huntington Library.
